summary: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.
cast: Lino Ventura|Paul Meurisse|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Simone Signoret|Claude Mann|Paul Crauchet|Christian Barbier|Serge Reggiani|André Dewavrin|Alain Dekok|Alain Mottet|Alain Libolt|Jean-Marie Robain|Albert Michel|Denis Sadier|Georges Sellier|Marco Perrin|Hubert de Lapparent|Colin Mann|Anthony Stuart|Michel Fretault|Gérard-Antoine Huart|Percival Russel|Michel Dacquin|Jeanne Pérez|Pierre Vaudier|Jacques Marbeuf|Franz Sauer|Marcel Bernier|Gaston Meunier|Françoise Bonnot|Adrien Cayla-Legrand|Nathalie Delon|Jacques Léonard
title: El ejército de las sombras
